Definition: In this task, you will be given a sentence that mentions two professions. One profession will have an unknown gender, while the other profession will have a gender that can be determined by the gendered pronouns used to refer to them in the text. You will need to output the profession that corresponds to the given gender.

 Gender: male
Positive Examples.explanation: The pronoun "he" is linked to the attendant rather than the chief.
